name: FreeRunners
description:
This goal of the game is a 3-D platforming to race on selection of maps in order to compete for the fastest time and play with others online. The game has a simple objective and was made to be enjoyed with friends or alone if you wanted to see if you could get the fastest time.

Some of the features are jumping, shooting, platforming, and multiplayer action with your friends.

The game is free and was just intended to be enjoyed by people passing by. It was made as a school project and not intended to earn any money. So leave suggestions for me and the team to consider in our future endeavors.
